test_scenarios.name: Homepage Load & Navigation to Category
steps: Verify the homepage loads successfully (ensure basic elements like logo, search bar, and main navigation categories are present).
Click on a main navigation category (e.g., 'Men' or 'Shoes').
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads without errors.  User is redirected to the selected category page.

test_scenarios.name: Add product to cart and Checkout
steps: Navigate to a product detail page.
Click 'View Bag' or proceed directly to checkout from the overlay.
Proceed to checkout as guest/existing user
test_scenarios.expected_result: Product added to the bag successfully. User successfully places order and receives order confirmation page.
